Username must be at least 4 characters: Username must be at least 4 characters
Password must be at least 8 characters: Password must be at least 8 characters
pleaseSelectAtLeastOneModelDot: Please select at least one model.
pressEnterToSendYourMessageOrShiftEnterT: Press Enter to send your message or Shift+Enter to add a new line
confirmDeleteAllConversations: Are you sure you want to delete all conversations?
confirmDeleteAllConversationsDetails: This will be a permanent deletion and cannot be retrieved once deleted. Please proceed with caution.
shareTips1: Messages you send after creating your link won't be shared. Anyone with the URL will be able to view the shared chat.
shareTips2: You have shared this chat before. If you want to update the shared chat content, delete this link and create a new shared link.
shareTips3: Share chat with others by images.
temperatureTips: A number between 0 and 2.0. The larger the value, the more random the response will be. We generally recommend altering this or top_p but not both.
topPTips: The model only considers tokens with a probability density ranking in the top P. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.
frequencyPenaltyTips: A number between -2.0 and 2.0. The larger the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words.
presencePenaltyTips: A number between -2.0 and 2.0. The larger the value, the more likely it is to expand into new topics.
nowYouNeedToSignInAgain: Now you need to sign in again
webSearchDefaultPrompt:
Web search results:

[web_results]
Current date: [current_date]

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: [query]
genTitlePrompt:
Generate a short title for the following content, no more than 10 words. 

Content:
maxTokenTips1: The maximum length of the generated text. The maximum context length of the current model is
maxTokenTips2: token, which includes the length of the prompt and the generated text. You should leave some space for your prompt and not set it too large or to the maximum.
frugalModeTip: Activate frugal mode, the client will not send historical messages to ChatGPT, which can save token consumption. If you want ChatGPT to understand the context of the conversation, please turn off frugal mode.

welcomeScreen.introduction2: You will need an OpenAI API Key before you can use this client.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.item1: Remembers what user said earlier in the conversation
capabilities.item2: Allows user to provide follow-up corrections

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.item2: May occasionally produce harmful instructions or biased content
limitations.item3: Limited knowledge of world and events after 2021
